summary: Contoso Wireless offers customers a simple and straightforward upgrade process. Customers can log into their account and select the “Upgrade” option to view available offers such as higher-tier service plans, device upgrades, additional lines, and international calling plans. Contoso Wireless regularly offers discounts and promotions on select upgrades, which customers can find on the website or social media. Device upgrades for phones and tablets from all major brands are also available. Customers don't need to return their old devices, but are encouraged to recycle or donate them if they are still in working condition.
